title: We are seeking a skilled Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to help drive paid media results for our team
job_overview:
We are seeking a skilled Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager to help drive paid media results for our team.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month based on experience

What you will do:

Run and optimize paid advertising campaigns on Google and Facebook.

Analyze performance data and propose improvements.

Ensure all campaigns meet KPIs and business objectives.

Requirements:

Over 1 year experience in paid digital advertising.

Strong focus on analytics and performance KPIs.

Remote working ability, self-disciplined.
